elements.title: Richard Geiger
elements.contents: ... that in the 1920s, Austrian painter Richard Geiger produced numerous portraits of the character Pierrette (example pictured)?

elements.title: Monthly Halloween
elements.contents: ... that Monthly Halloween was the first manga magazine to publish horror for girls?

elements.title: Beth Taylor
elements.contents: ... that the mezzo-soprano of Beth Taylor was the only lower voice when she appeared as Dardano in Handel's Amadigi, portraying her male character with fine vocal lines and "remarkable coloraturas"?

elements.title: Flat Top Mountain
elements.contents: ... that Flat Top Mountain's agriculture is mainly devoted to livestock and Christmas tree farming?

elements.title: Park "Saebyeolbe" Jong-ryeol
elements.contents: ... that Park "Saebyeolbe" Jong-ryeol was the first esports player to throw a Major League Baseball opening pitch?

elements.title: Say You Don't Mind
elements.contents: ... that Christopher Gunning apparently only got paid £15 to arrange the top-20 hit "Say You Don't Mind"?

elements.title: European Theatre Convention
elements.contents: ... that in 2014 the European Theatre Convention started a programme known as Dialogue of Cultures to support exchanges with theatres in Ukraine and other Eastern European countries?

elements.title: Phillips O'Brien
elements.contents: ... that Phillips O'Brien revised World War Two?
